Translations.Text: And those that give what they should, with their hearts apprehending that they are bound to return to their Lord some day
Those are the ones that hasten to do good things and they are in the forefront in doing them
And We do not lay on anyone a burden except to the extent he/she can bear. And with Us is a Book that speaks the truth. And they shall not be wronged
Nay, they are deluded about this. And, besides, they have other things to do
Until, when We punish the affluent among them, they cry foul
Cry not this day! You shall indeed not be given any help from Us
My Verses were certainly recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels
To ridicule the Verses in nocturnal confabulations
Is it then that they do not understand the Word, or is it that there has come to them that which did not come to their forefathers
Or, are they not acquainted with their Messenger, and so they deny him?h
Or do they say he is possessed? Nay! He has brought them the Truth, and most of them are averse to the Truth

And should the Truth follow their passions, there would certainly be chaos in the heavens and the earth and in everything therein. But We have brought them their Reminder, and from their Reminder they turn aside
Or, do you ask them for recompense? But the recompense of your Lord is the best! And He is the best of those who provide sustenance
And you do indeed invite them to the Straight Path
And those who do not believe in the Hereafter do indeed deviate from the Path
